mapper.select: SELECT my_badge_no , user_email , badge_no , act_count FROM my_badge WHERE my_badge_no = #{value}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO MY_BADGE USING DUAL ON ( user_email = #{userEmail:VARCHAR} and badge_no= #{badgeNo} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET act_count = act_count + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (my_badge_no, user_email , badge_no , act_count ) VALUES (seq_my_badge_my_badge_no.nextval , #{userEmail:VARCHAR}, #{badgeNo} , #{actCount} )
